pages.title: Cyclic Harvester
pages.text: Configurable harvester with up to 15x15 range. If used for various seed types, it is recommended to have an item collector set up near it as any extra drops will come out.

pages.title: EnderIO Farming Station
pages.text: Range depends on capacitor installed, up to 23x23.

pages.title: IE Garden Cloche
pages.text: Grows 1 crop, but has accelerated growth speed. Can also take fertilizer for added effect.

pages.title: Actually Additions Farmer
pages.text: 9x9 area. Has issues with some crops.
